author: Paul Kasabian
title: Chicago Sky's Stefanie Dolson: 'My Whole Family' Tested Positive for COVID-19
description: Chicago Sky center Stefanie Dolson announced during the  WNBA 's draft broadcast Friday that she and her entire family tested positive for COVID-19, per  ESPN :      "This virus has hit pretty close to home...
content:
Charles Rex Arbogast/Associated Press
Chicago Sky center Stefanie Dolson announced during the WNBA's draft broadcast Friday that she and her entire family tested positive for COVID-19, per ESPN:
"This virus has hit pretty close to home. About a month ago, m… [+1253 chars]
